reviewText:
This is one of my favorite movies of all time. Not only is the fighting awesome, but the story line is off the chain.
There is a scene on here that had a slight bit of Asian porn & I LOVED it! Not trying to be perverted or anything, but it's very rare that
you see that kind of scene in one of these movies. I can't lie tho...it was HOT! lol.
This is a necessary buy to keep in the collection.
